title: A Lamborghini Veneno Could Fetch US$6.3 Million at Bonhams
text:
2014 Lamborghini Veneno Roadster Courtesy of Bonhams

Text size

A Lamborghini Veneno roadster will lead an upcoming Bonhams sale in Switzerland this fall. Although it has a presale estimate of between CHF5.2 million and CHF6.2 million (US$5.3 million and US$6.3 million), it will be sold “without reserve,” meaning the highest bidder will become the new owner.

Including this Lamborghini, a collection of 25 modern supercars, hypercars, and other luxury motor cars from the State of Geneva will be offered at the auction, taking place at Bonmont Golf & Country Club in Chéserex, Switzerland, on Sept. 29. Proceeds of the sale of this collection will go to charity, according to Bonhams.
description: A collection of 25 supercars will be offered from the State of Geneva to benefit charity
